pages.name: Signalis
pages.description: A dark, atmospheric interface inspired by the game Signalis, featuring CRT effects and glitch animations.

pages.name: Ready or Not
pages.description: Military-style interface inspired by Ready or Not, with tactical overlay elements and status displays.

pages.name: Neumorphism
pages.description: Clean and modern interface using neumorphic design principles with soft shadows and minimal colors.

pages.name: Minimalist
pages.description: A minimalist design focusing on typography and whitespace, inspired by Swiss design principles.

pages.name: Y2K
pages.description: A vibrant and nostalgic interface inspired by the Y2K aesthetic, featuring bold colors and playful elements.

pages.name: Vintage/Analog
pages.description: A vintage-inspired interface with analog effects, reminiscent of old-school technology and design.

pages.name: ASCII/Pixel Art
pages.description: An ASCII art-inspired interface that uses text characters to create a unique visual style.

pages.name: Claymorphism
pages.description: A soft, tactile interface design that mimics the look and feel of clay, with rounded shapes and shadows.

pages.name: Retro/Synthwave
pages.description: A vibrant, neon-lit interface inspired by the retro-futuristic synthwave aesthetic, featuring bold colors and geometric shapes.

pages.name: Professional
pages.description: A sleek, professional interface design that emphasizes usability and modern aesthetics, suitable for business applications.
